title: Kaakaponnu Lyrics Yatchan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kaakaponnu
Singer(s): Priyadarshini & Antony Dasan
Music: Yuvan Shankar Raja
Movie: Yatchan

Kaakaponna sukkamaari
Thukkaraaman yekkavaara
Ushaar pakkuri Palli muttaai
Kallas raasa toorin kottaai.
Vaa dorai Vaa dorai
Uttu paaru alumbu
Nalla pantu keezhchi pottunu
Medai yaera kelambu.

Start music high
Glassa pottu vai.
Trousera thaan varinju katti
Give me high five.

Mela paaru sky
Keezha paaru poi
Sothaangaikum Peechankaikum
Give me no five

Yethivudu yaethivudu
sounda thaan yaethivudu
Annana thaan erakivudu
Aatatha thooki vudu.

Vaathiyaara makka
Maathiputaa kicka
Ada padicha rowdy suthi vaaran
vandi yeru sokka
Kazhuthu mela looka
kaththivachaan makka
Nee vazhicha beedi vaayula sutta
Thooki podu nekka

Start music high
Glassa pottu vai
Trousera thaan varinju katti
Give me high five.

Mela paaru sky
Keezha paaru poi
Sothaangaikum Peechankaikum
Give me no five

Kaakaponna sukkamaari
Thukkaraaman yekkavaara
Ushaar pakkuri Palli muttaai
Kallas raasa toorin kottaai.
Vaa dorai Vaa dorai
Uttu paaru alambu
Nalla pantu keezhchi pottunu
Medai yera kelambu

Surrunu surrunu yerum
summa sullunu sullunu oorum
Adhu kappunu kubbunu naarum
marum ulnaaku oorum.

Jivunu Jivvunu ketkum
Adhu ginnunu beerunu ketkum
Ulla ponadhum aalaye maathum
Yethum rottoram saathum
Round 1 Round 2 Round 3 mudinchuponaa
1 roundu 2 roundu 3 roundu
thodangum da naa

ssssStart.. sssssstart... ssssStart..
Start music high
Glassa pottu vai
Trousera thaan varinju katti
Give me high five.

Mela paaru sky
Keezha paaru poi
Sothaangaikum Peechankaikum
Give me no five

seo.title: Kaakaponnu Lyrics Yatchan Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Kaakaponnu Lyrics Yatchan Song Lyrics from Yatchan. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Yuvan and sung by Anthonydasan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
